name: Donkey Hare
description:
This game is for Escola Pia Game Jam 2022
Game Jam  Theme: Pauses has consequences + Trash + Donkey

Story

Once upon a time..

There was a Hare and a Tortoise.

But the Hare was donkey and the tortoise could stop the time as she pleased.

- Let's have a race - said the Hare.

The turtle accepted, he had the upper hand. Or not?...

Instructions

Button A (Z Key by default)
Smash it to RUN!

Button B (X Key by default)
Do Stop Time [Freeze Hare]

Developed

With TIC-80 in 48 hours
